dxf2svg.util
Class ProcessorManager

java.lang.Object
  dxf2svg.util.ProcessorManager
public final class ProcessorManager
extends java.lang.Object

This object manages the various processors switching states as the Dxf file is interpreted. It also mediates all requests for the output Svg Elements. All Svg element creation takes place within this class.

Version:
1.0 - April 14, 2005
Author:
Andrew Nisbet

public StyleSheetGenerator getStyleSheetGeneratorInstance()
Returns the instance of the style sheet generator for this conversion context.

endSection

public void endSection()
Used to signal the end of a section of a DXF. Section ends have significance to objects like HeaderProcessor which needs to make an SvgUtil object and TableProcessor which needs to make a Style Sheet Generator object right away so it is ready for the next section.

setDxfSection

public void setDxfSection(int section)
Sets the current Dxf Section being processed.
